titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1999, the duty on 2,2-Dichlorophenylacetic Acid Ethel Ester (DCPAE).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/6/1996--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on 2,2- dichlorophenylacetic acid ether ester (DCPAE).
